content: TE-SX FW Flat wall chisels Ultra-robust TE-S flat wall chisels for precision demolition of concrete and masonry walls ### Categories: Home > Products > Tool inserts > Chisels and rod drivers- - - ### FEATURES:Features Ultra-robust – inductive hardening makes these wall chisels especially resistant to mushrooming, wear and bending Easier resharpening – the induction-hardened, high alloy steel can be sharpened using an angle grinder Optimized for wall demolition – shorter shanks make these chisels a more efficient and comfortable solution for breaking up concrete walls Upgraded breaking power – extra-tough connection end transfers more force from the tool to the chisel Improved reliability – dust cap helps to avoid downtime and improve tool lifespan Applications Demolishing concrete, brick or block Channeling in concrete For use with TE-S electric jackhammers, breakers or rotary hammers ### TECHNICAL DATA: Connection end: TE-S Length: 11.8 in Width: 0.9 in Technical Data | Connection end | TE-S | Length | 11.8 in | Width | 0.9 in | Product Class | Ultimate ### ITEMS- 2104283 - Flat wall chisel TE-SX FW 30 - Package Size 1 pc
